job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Participate in the design and development of features and services, resolving technical problems as they arise
     * Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
     * Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
     * Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions within the team
     * Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team
     * Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
     * Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders as needed
     * Team performance management and PDP (Professional Development Plan) for team members
     * Scrum ceremonies facilitation
job_details.full_text:
Senior Python Engineer

* Participate in the design and development of features and services, resolving technical problems as they arise
     * Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
     * Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
     * Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions within the team
     * Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team
     * Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
     * Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders as needed
     * Team performance management and PDP (Professional Development Plan) for team members
     * Scrum ceremonies facilitation

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks, project management, and team leadership, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It lacks the core technical elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles and does not fit the specific technical requirements of those roles.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'design and development of features and services', 'resolving technical problems', 'ownership of the entire development process, from design to production', 'maintenance and improvement of existing functionality', and 'ensuring code quality' directly relate to traditional software engineering practices.
job_tasks.phrase: design and development of features and services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment' describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment

job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and improving existing code and ensuring it aligns with business needs is a core software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs

job_tasks.justification: Aligning code quality and functionality with business needs is a key aspect of understanding the business context.
While not explicitly MLOps, 'efficient deployment' and 'automation tests' touch upon operational aspects of software delivery.
Designing solutions for customer integrations and communicating with their technical teams requires understanding business requirements and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team

job_tasks.justification: Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers involves understanding business processes and customer requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers

job_tasks.justification: Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to stakeholders is a core business communication and understanding task.
job_tasks.phrase: Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders

job_tasks.justification: Facilitating Scrum ceremonies involves understanding and managing project workflows and team collaboration, which is tied to business process.

soft_skills.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process
Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions
communication with the customer's technical team
Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders
resolving technical problems as they arise
ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
Professional Development Plan (PDP) for team members
